column4: hi all i saw the admin at work use ubunto on a old machine for fun and loved it so im downloading it now for my old pc but i would like to ask here if it would work ok on a 200 mhz pc before i start formating it? :-)
anyone got time to answer a quick qustion? :) will ubunto run fine on my old 200 mhz pc? (has voodoo 3 card) :)
you could install something a bit lighter, like XFCE
